#summary One-sentence Events with Dojo.

= Introduction =

In this tutorial, we will be exploring [https://code.google.com/p/gwt-dojo-toolkit/source/browse/trunk/src/gwt/dojo/core/client/DojoOn.java DojoOn] (dojo/on) and how Dojo makes it easy to connect to DOM events. We will explore Dojo's publish/subscribe framework [https://code.google.com/p/gwt-dojo-toolkit/source/browse/trunk/src/gwt/dojo/core/client/MessageHub.java MessageHub] (dojo/topic).
